content: Just a thread for anyone with questions arising from the webinar on Wednesday - fire away!
What time does the connectathon start on Saturday? Thx.
Official kick-off is 9pm local time (Pacific, in this case). However, some people start showing up an hour earlier. And breakfast will be available at least an hour earlier.
I think @Lloyd McKenzie means 9am. Best to get there early and be all setup by 9am start.
Yeah, best to be early. I'll probably be down there from around 0830.
@John Moehrke are you around?
